channel.title: [PI] How do I make so I can...[PI]
channel.description: How do I make so I can open doors ? :S I have my home at al-kharid palace. And I can't get in!! Please help me :( Overload X base

item.title: [PI] How do I make so I can...[PI]
item.dc:creator: @sweetname sweetname
item.description:
@sweetname wrote:

Doors.cfg go next to the door and put.

door = 3357	3344	1533	1	0	0	1	0

Make shure to use tab.
Then //X,Y IS WHERE DOOR IS //Door state 0 = closed 1 = open. //FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH //ADDED 7 door as a example -bakatool //FACE = FACE BEGIN WITH //FACEOPEN = FACE OPENED DOOR //FACECLOSED = FACE CLOSED DOOR //HEIGHT 0 = GROUND LVL, 1 IS UP LADDER, 2 IS UP UP LADDER, 3 = UNDERGROUND I THINK.

Read full topic
